data.text: @she14768830 @StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl Reporting an adverse event doesn't mean it was caused by the vaccine itself. One participant reported swallowing a penny as an adverse event, which even a person as ignorant as you knows wasn't caused by the vaccine. You're wrong. Be better. If not, jump up in your own arse.
@she14768830 @StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl Non-insightful reply, ignorant and pathetic, with just the right amount of childishness. Classy.
@justplaincoreyw @StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl No your wrong , and I bet you watch CBC faithfully and wear 2 masks at once
@rick_pittman @StJohnsTelegram Just a breather for spring and summer.

@doylejw @StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl From - we’re all in this together 
To - every man/woman for himself/herself
@StJohnsTelegram No wonder some people are worried about these restrictions coming back. We are constantly being told about the possibility.

@she14768830 @StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl Learn to read AND interpret scientific reports if you're going to try to quote from them. Those 9 pages were a list of adverse effects being looked for, not caused by vaccines. People and their misinformation ...
@StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl How can these criminals even say the word vaccines, since the Pfizer 9 pages of adverse effects came out, shut up already the shots  killing people
@StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl Not sure how we got from “we’re all in this together” to “shag you if you’re vulnerable.”

@StJohnsTelegram @CMOH_NL @pjackson_nl 40 to 60 hospitalizations before considering bringing in mesagers again o dear God how will those people be cared for as the front line workers now are strongly over worked.Nurses and lpn's are suffering as it is.
